item.title: Designing for Production: Keeping Ops Happy
item.description: I gave a talk at Mountain West Ruby Conf entitled “Keep Ops Happy: Designing for Production”, a discussion of tips, tricks, and suggestions for how to design an application in a way that makes it easy to deploy and maintain in a production environment. The slides: And the video:
